title: A Confederate Soldier in Egypt
creator: William Wing Loring
description: Book written by William Wing Loring that details his ten years in the Egyptian military (1869-1879), including descriptions of military expeditions and instances of travel throughout Egypt.

title: Account Book of William Wing Loring
creator: William Wing Loring
description: Unpublished account book handwritted by William Wing Loring, with entries dated from June through October 1870. Includes descriptions of places Loring traveled to as well as his comments on the organization of the Egyptian military.
